text: Hans Thomas Fogdö, born 14 March 1970 in Gällivare, Sweden is a Swedish former alpine skier.Thomas Fogdö - Presentation, Artist1.se, accessed 21 May 2010 A slalom specialist, he won the World Cup for that discipline in 1993. On 7 February 1995 he became disabled after breaking his spine in a training accident at Åre, Sweden. Today he works for various sponsor projects and for the Swedish Ski Federation. ==World Cup victories== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Location !
